content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Munich to be a great living space. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I saw the apartment and it is indeed nice. However, I am a student and I have a budget. I was hoping for something around 400 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 400 Euros per month is quite low for the location and quality of the apartment. I'm looking for a rent closer to 800 Euros. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of your apartment. However, 800 Euros is too high for me. I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 Euros per month is still not enough for me. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the apartment. How about 650 Euros? It's a fair price considering the location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 650 Euros is still too high. I can pay 550 Euros per month. This is the highest I can afford.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 550 Euros is not acceptable. The apartment is worth more than that. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need a price that reflects the market value. How about 600 Euros? It's a reasonable compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 600 Euros is still a little high for me. I am willing to pay 575 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 575 Euros is better, but it's still not the price I'm looking for. I'm willing to go down to 590 Euros, but that's as low as I can go. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 590 Euros is acceptable to me. I agree to the price of 590 Euros Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 590 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
